products.name: Classic Mayo
products.ingredientsText: avocado oil, filtered water, egg yolks, organic whole eggs, organic distilled white vinegar, organic mustard (distilled organic vinegar, water, organic mustard seed, salt, organic spices), salt, organic rosemary extract,
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Classic Mayo is made with high-quality ingredients including eggs, oil, and vinegar.","The packaging is recyclable, reducing its environmental impact.","Classic Mayo contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, ensuring a natural taste.","The product is gluten-free, catering to a wider range of dietary needs."]

products.name: FitCrunch (Chocolate Peanut Butter)
products.ingredientsText: Protein Blend (Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate), Soy Protein Isolate, Vegetable Oils Paim Kernel and Palm), Vegetable Glycerin, Peanut Butter (Dry Roasted Peanuts, Palm Oil, Dextrose, Saft, Sorbitol, Peanuts, Sugar, Maltitol, Gelatin [Bovine], Peanut Flour, Cocoa (processed with alkali), Brown Rice Flour and Water Contains 2% or less of the following: Glucose Syrup, Sunflower Oil, Tapioca Starch, Salt, Natural Flavor, Soybean Oil, Sucralose, Maltodextrin, Sodium Caseinate, Sunflower Lecithin, Propylene Glycol Mono Esters, Baking Soda, Mono & Diglycerides, Potassium Sorbate (preservative), Acetylated Monoglycerides, Whey, Whey Powder, Soy Lecithin, Beta-Carotene (for color), Vitamin A Palmitate, Silicon Dioxide, Natural Tocopherols (to preserve freshness), and Almond. Contains: Milk, Soy, Almond, and Peanut Products. Manufactured in a Plant that Processes Milk, Soy, Wheat, Tree Nut, Peanut, and Egg Products.
products.categories: Dietary supplements, Bodybuilding supplements, Protein bars
products.facts: ["FitCrunch bars are made with high-quality protein sources including whey protein isolate.","The packaging is designed to be lightweight, reducing material waste during transport.","FitCrunch emphasizes using non-GMO ingredients in their formulations.","The product is produced in a facility that adheres to strict quality control standards to ensure safety and consistency."]

products.name: Unsweetened Original Plant-based Milk
products.ingredientsText: Water, ripptein (pea protein), sunflower oil. contains less than 0.5% of vitamin a palmitate, vitamin d2, dha algal oil, calcium phosphate, dipotassium phosphate, sunflower lecithin, natural flavors, sea salt, organic guar gum, gellan gum. gum acacia
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives
products.labels: Certified B Corporation, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from whole plants, typically including ingredients like almonds, oats, or soybeans.","Often packaged in recyclable containers, reducing plastic waste.","Free from added sugars, artificial flavors, and preservatives, ensuring a clean ingredient profile.","Plant-based milk production generally requires less water and land compared to dairy milk, making it more eco-friendly."]

products.name: Protein bar, blueberry
products.ingredientsText: Dates, egg whites, almonds, cashews, blueberries, natural blueberry flavor.
products.facts: ["Contains high-quality protein sources such as whey or plant-based proteins.","Often includes natural ingredients like oats, nuts, and blueberries for added nutrition.","Packaging is often recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Typically free from artificial preservatives and colors, ensuring better quality and health benefits."]

products.name: Honey bunches

products.ingredientsText: Corn, whole grain wheat, sugar, whole grain rolled oats, almonds, rice, canola oil, wheat flour, malted barley flour, corn syrup, salt, molasses, honey, caramel color, barley malt extract, cinnamon, natural and artificial flavor, annatto extract (color). bht added to preserve freshness. vitamins and minerals: reduced iron, niacinamide (vitamin b3), vitamin a palmitate, pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin b6), zinc oxide, thiamin mononitrate (vitamin b1), riboflavin (vitamin b2), folic acid, vitamin d3, vitamin b12.

products.ingredientsText: édulcorant: maltitol, huiles végétales (colza, palme), noisettes (13%), cacao maigre, lait écrémé en poudre (7%), lactosérum en poudre (lait), émulsifiant: lécithines (tournesol), arome. Peyt contenir des traces d'autres fruits à coque et de soja. Une consommation excessive peut avoir des effets laxatifs.
products.labels: Sustainable farming, Excessive consumption can have laxative effects, Green Dot, UTZ Certified, With sweeteners, en:nutriscore
products.facts: ["200 g is a measure of weight commonly used in cooking and food packaging.","Materials weighing 200 g can vary widely, including food items, packaging materials, and small household products.","Ecologically, the impact of a 200 g item depends on its material; for example, plastic has a larger environmental footprint than paper or glass.","Quality can vary based on the manufacturing process and material used; higher quality items often weigh more due to denser materials."]
